snippet: The major market indexes rose as investors waited to see if the Federal Reserve would announce a reduction in its economic stimulus.
abstract: Stock market rises as investors await word from Federal Reserve about scaling back its economic stimulus.
lead_paragraph: The major market indexes rose as investors waited to see if the Federal Reserve would announce a reduction in its economic stimulus.

headline.main: Market Rises, Awaiting Decision From the Fed
headline.print_headline: Market Rises, Awaiting Decision From the Fed
